page.title: 06Farrochie Farm
page.content: {Farrochie Farm }is a{dairy farm} on the outskirts of Stonehaven (grid ref.856863).The farm is 170 acres and is tenanted by Mr David Martin whose family have run the business for many years. The farm has 110 dairy cattle and has been affected by the construction of the Stonehaven bypass which has split the land in two and resulted in a necessary move from the 100year old buildings to the east of the bypass to a new dairy,with a grant aid,on the west side.A new farmhouse was also constructed.All the land on the east will eventually be used for housing. The main landuse of the farm is pasture.The land is also used for silage and barley.
